devdoc.details: when deploying make sure to get the right Tableland contract for desired chainupon deployment this contract creates three Tableland Tables:AdSpaces_{chain}_{tableID}, Campaigns_{chain}_{tableID}, Deals_{chain}_{tableID}Custom errors need to be added...

params.tablelandAddress: see docs.tableland.xyz for contracts on chains

createAdSpace(string,string,string,uint8.details: id and owner will be set automatically

params._numNFTs: amount of NFTs to mint to msg.sender of creation
params._size: size of the AdSpaces: wide | small | scyscraper
params._website: website where the AdSpace will be located

createCampaign(string,string,string,stri.details: owner will be auto assigned to msg.sender

params.i: the identifier (number) of the Adspace interested in

returns._0: address the addess of the AdSpace Contract with identifier i
uint256 the full name of the current AdSpace Table of this AdSpaceFactory
uint256 the id of the current AdSpace Table of this AdSpaceFactory
uint256 the full name of the current Campaign Table of this AdSpaceFactory
uint256 the id of the current Campaign Table of this AdSpaceFactory
uint256 the current amount of Adspaces created by this Factory
uint256 he full name of the current Deal Table of this AdSpaceFactory
uint256 the id of the current Deal Table of this AdSpaceFactory

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createCampaign(string,string,string,stri.notice: Creating a Campaign and inserting row on Tableland

createDeal(uint256,uint256,uint40,uint25.notice: Creating Deal and inserting row on Tablelandafter creating the deal, the Adspace Table will update on the affected row

userdoc.notice: This contract is the controller of all Tableland interactionsand deployer of all the AdSpace contracts
